    • 构造器详细资料

      • Tower

        public Tower(int x,
             int y,
             double initial_tower_firing_speed,
             double initial_tower_range,
             double initial_tower_damage,
             double tower_cost,
             Mana mana,
             Wavemangement wavemangement,
             java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,javax.sound.sampled.Clip> sound)
        Constructs a new Tower object with the specified attributes.
        参数:
        x - The x-coordinate of the tower's position.
        y - The y-coordinate of the tower's position.
        initial_tower_firing_speed - The initial firing speed of the tower.
        initial_tower_range - The initial range of the tower.
        initial_tower_damage - The initial damage of the tower.
        tower_cost - The cost of building the tower.
        mana - The mana resource associated with the tower.
        wavemangement - The wave management system for controlling enemy waves.
        sound - The sound effects associated with the tower.

    • 方法详细资料

      • speed_level_up

        public void speed_level_up()
        Speed upgrade of tower

        public void damage_level_up()

        public void range_level_up()
        Range of tower

      • updaterandommonster

        public void updaterandommonster()
        Add monsters in range to the attack list

      • attack

        public void attack(boolean accelerate)
        Initiates an attack by the tower, randomly targeting monsters. The tower's attack speed is determined by its firing speed.
        参数:
        accelerate - If true, the attack is accelerated.

      • toweraction

        public void toweraction(boolean accelerate)
        Executes the tower's actions, including searching for nearby enemies and initiating attacks.
        参数:
        accelerate - If true, the tower's actions are accelerated.

      • allowupgratespeed

        public boolean allowupgratespeed()
        Determines if the current mana is sufficient to upgrade the tower's firing speed.
        返回:
        True if mana is sufficient; otherwise, false.

      • allowupgraterange

        public boolean allowupgraterange()
        Determines if the current mana is sufficient to upgrade the tower's range.
        返回:
        True if mana is sufficient; otherwise, false.

      • allowupgratedamage

        public boolean allowupgratedamage()
        Determines if the current mana is sufficient to upgrade the tower's damage.
        返回:
        True if mana is sufficient; otherwise, false.
